session_info.name: MOZB - Invited Orals, Particle Sources and Alternative Accelerating Techniques

papers.title: Superconducting RF Guns: Emerging Technology for Future Accelerators
authors: This talk should give an overview of Superconducting photo injectors (SRF guns) and focus on the present status of SRF gun development
the technical requirements and the critical issues like cavity design

papers.title: Advances in Photocathodes for Accelerators
authors: Cornell Laboratory for Accelerator-Based Sciences and Education
This talk reviews advances in photocathode technology for accelerators: cathodes demonstrating record average currents and deliverable charge

possessing ultra-low intrinsic emittance and sub-picosecond response time. It addresses the grand challenge to combine all these useful properties into a single photoemitter - one that is being actively pursued by the research community.
